tika-vin10t1:8: Sasikkho sādiyanto so, ṭhapetvā kiriyaṃ cuto.
tika-vin10t1:59: Nimittaṃ itthiyā tassa, chupato garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:85: Apade ahayo macchā, kapotā dvipadepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:130: Tatthajātakakaṭṭhaṃ vā, lataṃ vā chindato pana;
tika-vin10t1:133: Pathaviṃ khaṇato vāpi, byūhato paṃsumeva vā;
tika-vin10t1:134: Āmasantassa vā kumbhiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:142: Uddharantassa khāṇuṃ vā, chindato saṅkhalimpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:143: Thullaccayaṃ tato kumbhiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:145: Paṭhamaṃ pana kumbhiṃ vā, uddharitvā tathā puna;
tika-vin10t1:146: Ṭhānā cāveti khāṇuṃ vā, saṅkhaliṃ vāpi so nayo.
tika-vin10t1:148: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, mūle sāreti rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:151: Jātaṃ chindati ce rukkhaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ kumbhimatthake;
tika-vin10t1:157: Haranto kumbhiyā bhaṇḍaṃ, muṭṭhiṃ chindati attano;
tika-vin10t1:158: Bhājane vā gataṃ katvā, hoti bhikkhu parājito.
tika-vin10t1:160: Hāraṃ vā pana pāmaṅgaṃ, suttāruḷhaṃ tu kumbhiyā;
tika-vin10t1:161: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:167: Sakalampi ca taṃ kumbhiṃ, pivato na parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:169: Sace khipati yaṃ kiñci, bhaṇḍakaṃ telakumbhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:170: Taṃ pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ, dhuvaṃ pivati tāvade.
tika-vin10t1:173: Āviñjetvāpi vā kumbhiṃ, telaṃ gāḷeti ce tathā.
tika-vin10t1:176: Pītaṃ telañca taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, uddharantova dhaṃsito.
tika-vin10t1:178: Tattheva bhindato telaṃ, chaḍḍentassa tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t1:179: Jhāpentassa abhogaṃ vā, karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:190: Dvīsu passesu pakkhanto, heṭṭhā pādanakhā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:196: Hatthaṃ vāpi pasāreti, purato vāssa tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t1:198: Moropi gagane pakkhe, cāreti na ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:204: Aggahetvā gahetvā vā, hatthena pana attano;
tika-vin10t1:205: Ṭhānā cāveti ce moraṃ, sayaṃ ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t1:208: Kalāpaggena vā phuṭṭhaṃ, mukhatuṇḍena bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t1:210: Atikkāmeyya yo moraṃ, ṭhānā cāveti nāma so;
tika-vin10t1:213: Gagane pana gacchanto, kare moro nilīyati;
tika-vin10t1:216: Sace gaṇhāti taṃ moraṃ, itarena karena so;
tika-vin10t1:217: Cāvitattā pana ṭhānā, bhikkhu ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t1:219: Itaraṃ pana morassa, upaneti sace karaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:220: Na doso tattha uḍḍetvā, sayameva nilīyati.
tika-vin10t1:222: Disvā aṅge nilīnaṃ taṃ, theyyacittena gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:223: Pāde thullaccayaṃ hoti, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:231: Chijjamānaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, patte patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:237: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, hatthe vattheva matthake;
tika-vin10t1:238: Taṃ taṃ tassa bhave ṭhānaṃ, yattha yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:244: Saṃharitvā sace vaṃse, ṭhapitaṃ hoti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:245: Katvā punorato bhogaṃ, tathā antañca pārato.
tika-vin10t1:248: Na tu cīvaravaṃso so, hotīti sakalo mato.
tika-vin10t1:251: Itarenapi vā phuṭṭhaṃ, orimantena vā puna.
tika-vin10t1:256: Uddhaṃ vā ukkhipantassa, cīvaraṃ pana vaṃsato;
tika-vin10t1:259: Rajjukena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:266: Saṃharitvā tu nikkhitte, cīvare viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t1:268: Sikkāya pakkhipitvā yaṃ, laggitaṃ hoti bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:269: Sikkāto taṃ haranto vā, saha sikkāya vā cuto.
tika-vin10t1:272: Agge vā pana bunde vā, gahetvā parikaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t1:281: Bhittiṃ pana ca nissāya, ṭhapitepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t1:283: Cālentassa ca tālassa, phalaṃ vatthu hi pūrati;
tika-vin10t1:284: Yenassa bandhanā mutte, tasmiṃ pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:286: Piṇḍiṃ chindati tālassa, sace pārājikaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:294: Vatthu taṃ chindato pupphaṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ vade.
tika-vin10t1:297: Na chijjati tato yāva, tāva naṃ parirakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:303: Ākārena sace tāni, ṭhānā cāveti nassati.
tika-vin10t1:306: Cāletvā udakaṃ puppha-ṭṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:311: Accuggatassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ, jalato sakalaṃ jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:317: Pupphe gahetvā nāmetvā, uppāṭeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:318: Na tassa udakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, naṭṭho uppāṭitakkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:320: Yo hi sassāmike macche, theyyacittena gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t1:323: Tassevaṃ gaṇhato vatthu, yena macchena pūrati;
tika-vin10t1:329: Nīrato uppatitvā yo, tīre patati vārijo;
tika-vin10t1:333: Ninne macchavisaṃ nāma, pakkhipitvā gate pana.
tika-vin10t1:335: Pacchā macchavisaṃ macchā, khāditvā pilavanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:341: Gahetvā sāmikā macche, sace yanti nirālayā;
tika-vin10t1:342: Gaṇhato pana te sese, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:345: Eseva ca nayo sese, kacchapādimhi vārije.
tika-vin10t1:357: Purato pacchato vāpi, passato vāpi kaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t1:365: Bandhitvā pana yā tīre, ṭhapitā niccale jale;
tika-vin10t1:366: Bandhanañca ṭhitokāso, ṭhānaṃ tassā dvidhā mataṃ.
tika-vin10t1:369: Pacchā kenacupāyena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:372: Eseva ca nayo vutto, theyyacittassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:385: Theyyā titthe ṭhitaṃ nāvaṃ, āruhitvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:391: Āgamma balavā vāto, nāvaṃ harati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:392: Vāteneva haṭā nāvā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:395: Acāventova taṃ ṭhānā, kiṇitvā ce palāyati.
tika-vin10t1:398: Sayameva ca gacchantiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:401: Yānaṃ nāma ratho vayhaṃ, sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā;
tika-vin10t1:408: Yānaṃ pājayato tassa, nisīditvā dhure pana.
tika-vin10t1:419: Purato pacchato vāpi, ṭhānā cāveti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:420: Thullaccayaṃ tu tiṇṇampi, ṭhānā cāve parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:429: Uddhīsu vā gahetvā taṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:431: Ṭhapitassa hi cakkassa, nābhiyā pana bhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:434: Phusitvā yaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhūmiṃ, nemipassena nābhiyā;
tika-vin10t1:444: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, theyyacittena yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:447: Khandhaṃ oropite bhāre, tassa pārājikaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t1:458: Parājeti paraṃ dhammaṃ, caranto ce parājito.522
tika-vin10t1:461: Parajjati sayaṃ dhammaṃ, caranto yopi tassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:472: Asitena ca lāyitvā, chinditvā vā karena ca.
tika-vin10t1:474: Yasmiṃ bījepi vā vatthu, sīse pūreti muṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:475: Bandhanā mocite tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:477: Acchinno pana daṇḍo vā, taco vā appamattako;
tika-vin10t1:489: Tañca kho sāmikānaṃ tu, dhuranikkhepane sati;
tika-vin10t1:492: Gahetabbā sace hoti, dvīhi khīlehi yā pana;
tika-vin10t1:496: Rajjuṃ vāpi pasāreti, yaṭṭhiṃ pāteti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:498: Yehi dvīhi payogehi, attano santakaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:499: Ādo thullaccayaṃ tesu, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:503: Gāmaṭṭhepi ca vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:506: Tiṇaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, lataṃ vā kaṭṭhameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:510: Tacchetvā ṭhapito rukkho, gahetabbo na kocipi.
tika-vin10t1:515: Lakkhaṇe challiyonaddhe, na doso koci gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:519: Citte cintento vā aññaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hotevassa.
tika-vin10t1:537: Āviñjitvā pavesetvā, chiddaṃ katvāpi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:539: Vāpiyaṃ vā taḷāke vā, bhājanaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t1:545: Anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhatvā, chindanto ubhayatthapi;
tika-vin10t1:552: Chinditvā yāva saṅghassa, na niyyādenti te pana;
tika-vin10t1:553: Ābhataṃ tāva taṃ sabbaṃ, tesameva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:555: Tasmā taṃ theyyacittena, gaṇhantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:558: Yadā niyyāditaṃ tehi, tato paṭṭhāya saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:562: Sabbasādhāraṇattā ca, aññaṃ viya na hotidaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:565: Aggiṃ vā deti satthena, ākoṭeti samantato;
tika-vin10t1:568: Yena vā tena vā rukkho, vinassati ca ḍayhati;
tika-vin10t1:572: Sīsato kaṇṇato vāpi, gīvato hatthatopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:584: Nivatthaṃ pana vatthaṃ yo, acchindati parassa ce;
tika-vin10t1:585: Paropi pana lajjāya, sahasā taṃ na muñcati.
tika-vin10t1:587: Ākaḍḍhati ca coropi, so paro tāva rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:596: Athāpi parikappetvā, pātāpeti va yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:599: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto;
tika-vin10t1:600: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vadato, na doso chaḍḍitepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:602: Āgantvā theyyacittena, pacchā taṃ gaṇhato siyā;
tika-vin10t1:608: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vutto ca, chaḍḍetvā pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:621: ‘‘Raho mayā panetassa, ṭhapitaṃ kiṃ nu dassati’’;
tika-vin10t1:624: Tasmiṃ dāne nirussāhe, paro ce nikkhipe dhuraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:631: Suṅkaghātassa antova, ṭhatvā pāteti ce bahi;
tika-vin10t1:632: Dhuvaṃ patati ce hatthā, muttamatte parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:634: Taṃ rukkhe khāṇuke vāpi, hutvā paṭihataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t1:635: Vātukkhittampi vā anto, sace patati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:637: Patitvā bhūmiyaṃ pacchā, vaṭṭantaṃ pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:640: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā pavaṭṭantaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ ce parājayo;
tika-vin10t1:644: Sārato taṃ gahetabbaṃ, yuttaṃ viya ca dissati.
tika-vin10t1:646: Sayaṃ vā yadi vaṭṭeti, vaṭṭāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:647: Aṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānaṃ taṃ, gataṃ nāsakaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:649: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā sace anto, bahi gacchati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:652: Gacchante pana yāne vā, gaje vā taṃ ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:655: Ṭhapite ṭhitayāne vā, payogena vinā gate;
tika-vin10t1:658: Sace pājeti taṃ yānaṃ, ṭhapetvā yānake maṇiṃ;
tika-vin10t1:661: Suṅkaṭṭhāne mataṃ suṅkaṃ, gantuṃ datvāva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:665: Antojātaṃ dhanakkītaṃ, dinnaṃ vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t1:668: Bhujissaṃ vā harantassa, mānusaṃ mātarāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:683: Saṇikaṃ pana gacchantaṃ, sace vadati sopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:684: Sīghaṃ gacchati ce tassa, vacanena parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:686: Palāyitvā sace aññaṃ, gāmaṃ vā nigamampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:687: Gataṃ disvā tato tañce, palāpeti parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:700: So nikkhamati ce sappo, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:702: Tathā katvā tu maṇḍūka-mūsikānaṃ ravampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:706: Yena kenaci nikkhante, sappe pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:716: Ṭhānaṃ sālā ca vatthu ca, aṅgaṇaṃ sakalaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:719: Tasmā tesaṃ vasā hatthiṃ, harato kāraye budho.
tika-vin10t1:721: Nagarassa bahiddhā tu, ṭhitassa pana hatthino;
tika-vin10t1:724: Nipannassa gajassekaṃ, ṭhānaṃ taṃ uṭṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:725: Tasmiṃ uṭṭhitamatte tu, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:732: Garukaṃ theyyacittena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t1:748: Nikkhipeyyassa satthaṃ vā, vadeyya maraṇe guṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:751: Asandheyyova so ñeyyo, dvedhā bhinnasilā viya.
tika-vin10t1:756: Tattha kāyena vā kāya-paṭibaddhena vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:757: Mārentassa paraṃ ghāto, ayaṃ sāhatthiko mato.
tika-vin10t1:759: ‘‘Evaṃ tvaṃ paharitvā taṃ, mārehī’’ti ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:769: Ayaṃ vijjāmayo nāma, payogo pañcamo mato.
tika-vin10t1:771: Samatthā māraṇe yā ca, iddhi kammavipākajā;
tika-vin10t1:777: Bahusvapi yamuddissa, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:778: Maraṇena ca tasseva, kammunā tena bajjhati.
tika-vin10t1:783: Mate pahaṭamatte vā, pacchā mubhayathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:786: Evaṃ sāhatthiko ñeyyo, tathā āṇattikopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:787: Ettāvatā samāsena, dve payogā hi dassitā.
tika-vin10t1:789: Vatthu kālo ca deso ca, satthañca iriyāpatho;
tika-vin10t1:792: Māretabbo hi yo tattha, so ‘‘vatthū’’ti pavuccati;
tika-vin10t1:793: Pubbaṇhādi siyā kālo, sattānaṃ yobbanādi ca.
tika-vin10t1:795: Deso gāmādi viññeyyo, satthaṃ taṃ sattamāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:801: ‘‘Yaṃ mārehī’’ti āṇatto, aññaṃ māreti ce tato;
tika-vin10t1:810: Āṇatto ‘‘ajja pubbaṇhe, mārehī’’ti ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:811: So ce māreti sāyanhe, mūlaṭṭho parimuccati.
tika-vin10t1:819: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t1:824: ‘‘Imaṃ gāme ṭhitaṃ veriṃ, mārehī’’ti ca bhāsito;
tika-vin10t1:825: Sace so pana māreti, ṭhitaṃ taṃ yattha katthaci.
tika-vin10t1:827: Natthi tassa visaṅketo, ubho bajjhanti kammunā;
tika-vin10t1:830: ‘‘Vaneyevā’’ti vā vutto, gāme māreti cepi vā;
tika-vin10t1:837: Yena kenaci satthena, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t1:842: Iti vutto sace veriṃ, dhārāya itarāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:849: Māreti naṃ nisinnaṃ ce, visaṅketo na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:852: Vutto māreti gacchantaṃ, nisinnaṃ vā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:855: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbiriyāpathesu ca.
tika-vin10t1:857: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t1:860: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t1:861: Chinditvā yadi māreti, visaṅketova hoti so.
tika-vin10t1:866: Dīghaṃ rassaṃ kisaṃ thūlaṃ, kāḷaṃ odātameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:869: Sopi yaṃ kiñci āṇatto, sace māreti tādisaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:873: Khaṇantassa ca opātaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:876: Patitvā ca mate tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:878: Nipatitvā panaññasmiṃ, mate doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:881: ‘‘Patitvā ettha yo koci, maratū’’ti hi yattakā;
tika-vin10t1:882: Maranti nipatitvā ce, dosā hontissa tattakā.
tika-vin10t1:887: Patitvā gabbhinī tasmiṃ, sagabbhā ce marissati;
tika-vin10t1:893: Verino tattha pātetvā, sace mārenti verino;
tika-vin10t1:894: Patitaṃ tattha mārenti, nīharitvā sace bahi.
tika-vin10t1:896: Nibbattitvā hi opāte, matā ce opapātikā;
tika-vin10t1:897: Asakkontā ca nikkhantuṃ, sabbattha ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t1:905: Tathā yakkhādayo pāṇe, khate uddissa bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:909: Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti yo tattha, sace bajjhanti pāṇino.
tika-vin10t1:914: Uddissa hi kate pāse, yaṃ panuddissa oḍḍito;
tika-vin10t1:917: Mūlena vā mudhā vāpi, dinne pāse parassa hi;
tika-vin10t1:920: Yena laddho sace lopi, pāsamuggaḷitampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:923: Yo pāsaṃ uggaḷāpetvā, yāti pāpabhayā sace;
tika-vin10t1:924: Taṃ disvā puna aññopi, saṇṭhapeti hi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t1:926: Baddhā baddhā maranti ce, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t1:929: Gopetvāpi na mokkho hi, pāsayaṭṭhiṃ sayaṃkataṃ;
tika-vin10t1:930: Tamañño puna gaṇhitvā, saṇṭhapeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:932: Tappaccayā marantesu, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t1:933: Nāsetvā sabbaso vā taṃ, jhāpetvā vā vimuccati.
tika-vin10t1:935: Ropentassa ca sūlaṃ vā, sajjentassa adūhalaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:960: Jānāti ce hoti cuto hi no ce;
tika-vin10t1:978: Paṭhame dutiye cante, pariyāyo na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:982: Sesā ca tisamuṭṭhānā, tesamaṅgāni satta tu.
tika-vin10t1:996: Mudupiṭṭhi ca lambī ca, mukhaggāhī nisīdako;
tika-vin10t1:1027: Sukkaṃ yadi vimoceti, garukaṃ tassa niddise.
tika-vin10t1:1030: Thullaccayaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ, sace sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:1033: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, yadi sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:1035: Vatthiṃ kīḷāya pūretvā, passāvetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1057: Ekena pana hatthena, gahetvā dutiyena vā;
tika-vin10t1:1063: Aṅgulīnaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, gahaṇe ekato pana;
tika-vin10t1:1064: Ekāyeva siyāpatti, na hi koṭṭhāsato siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1094: Vādāpetuñca vādetuṃ, vāditaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1097: Pūjā buddhassa kātabbā, vattabbāti ca viññunā.
tika-vin10t1:1119: Gaṇanāya ca vācānaṃ, itthīnaṃ garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1121: Sā ce nappaṭijānāti, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:1141: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sā ce, jānāti garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1143: No ce jānāti sā yakkhi-petidevīsu paṇḍake;
tika-vin10t1:1144: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1150: Obhāso tena rāgena, khaṇe tasmiṃ vijānanaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1157: Vīmaṃsati garu hoti, paccāharati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:1172: Ekeneva ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1174: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, gilānassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:1200: Sace ekavipannā sā, garukaṃ ekakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1206: Hatthakammampi nāmetaṃ, kiñci vatthu na hoti hi.
tika-vin10t1:1211: ‘‘Goṇaṃ demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1220: Paccayesu hi tīsveva, viññatti na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1226: Pharasuṃ vāpi vāsiṃ vā, nisentassāpi dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1227: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ rukkhaṃ, tassa pācittiyā saha.
tika-vin10t1:1232: Yā pana dvīhi piṇḍehi, niṭṭhānaṃ tu gamissati;
tika-vin10t1:1233: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tesu, paṭhame dutiye garu.
tika-vin10t1:1236: Tathā bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā, bhindatopi ca taṃ kuṭiṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1241: Desāpetvāva bhikkhūhi, vatthuṃ pana ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:1248: Adesetvā sace vatthuṃ, yo kareyya mahallakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1262: Suddhaṃ vā yadi vāsuddhaṃ, tesu aññatarena yo.
tika-vin10t1:1276: Taṃ ce paro vijānāti, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:1281: Atha sopi ‘‘mayā diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ vā’’ti ca bhāsati;
tika-vin10t1:1282: Tesaṃ dvinnampi saṅghādi-seso hoti na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t1:1284: Dūtaṃ vā pana pesetvā, paṇṇaṃ vā pana sāsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1294: Tathā kammaṃ karontassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1309: Codeti vā tathāsaññī, codāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:1313: Samaggassa ca saṅghassa, bhedatthaṃ vāyameyya yo;
tika-vin10t1:1316: So hi bhikkhūhi vattabbo, ‘‘bhedatthaṃ mā parakkama’’;
tika-vin10t1:1319: Vuccamāno hi teheva, nissajjeyya na ceva yaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1323: Disvā sutvā hi ñatvā vā, avadantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1326: Dūrampi pana gantabbaṃ, sace sakkoti tāvade.
tika-vin10t1:1329: Dūtaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, pesatopi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1332: Kammavācāhi ca dvīhi, hoti thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1340: Ñattito pana pubbe vā, pacchā vā taṅkhaṇepi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1347: Yasmiñca nibbematiko, taṃ sabbaṃ tassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1377: Kamme kariyamāne taṃ, accajaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t1:1379: Cuṇṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ phalaṃ pupphaṃ, veḷuṃ kaṭṭhañca mattikaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1391: Haritvā vā harāpetvā, pitūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1394: Tañca kho vatthupūjatthaṃ, dātabbaṃ na panaññathā;
tika-vin10t1:1406: Gilānānaṃ manussānaṃ, dātabbaṃ tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1409: Saṅghārāme yathā yatra, saṅghena katikā katā;
tika-vin10t1:1422: Tathā ropāpane vuttaṃ, ubhayattha ca bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:1424: Sakiṃ āṇattiyā tassa, bahūnaṃ ropane pana;
tika-vin10t1:1425: Sadukkaṭā tu pācitti, suddhaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:1428: Ropane paribhogatthaṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:1430: Kappiyabhūmi ce hoti, sayaṃ ropetumeva ca;
tika-vin10t1:1434: Vaṭṭateva ca bhikkhūnaṃ, taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1436: Siñcane pana sabbattha, sayaṃ siñcāpanepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:1443: Siñcane dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā siñcāpanepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1451: Ganthimaṃ gopphimaṃ nāma, vedhimaṃ veṭhimampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:1454: Tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṃ vā, vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1463: Veṭhimaṃ nāma veṭhetvā, kataṃ mālāguṇehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1472: Sabbametaṃ sayaṃ kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1476: Aññehi pūritaṃ puppha-paṭaṃ vā vāyitumpi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1479: Kharapattamayaṃ mālaṃ, sabbaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1485: Pupphesuyeva vā pupphaṃ, pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1488: Pavesentassa pupphāni, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:1497: Atha kho vejjakammādi, na kattabbaṃ kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1505: Jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭho ca, tathā bhaginiyo duve;
tika-vin10t1:1508: Pitucchā mātulo cāti, dasime ñātayo matā;
tika-vin10t1:1511: Sace bhesajjametesaṃ, nappahoti na hoti vā;
tika-vin10t1:1512: Yācantipi ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1514: Sace te na ca yācanti, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1515: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā vā, ‘‘dassanti puna me ime’’.
tika-vin10t1:1517: Etesaṃ tu kulā yāva, sattamā kuladūsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1521: Sace te ñātakā honti, kātuṃ tesampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1523: Aññātakā sace honti, bhātuno anujāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:1526: Atha tesampi puttānaṃ, katvā dātabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:1538: Jalaṃ hatthena cāletvā, madditvā pana suttakaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1540: Dātabbaṃ bhikkhunā katvā, tesameva ca santakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1541: Attano udakaṃ tesaṃ, suttaṃ vā deti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1550: Ṭhapetvā taṃ panaññassa, pitunopi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1553: Satthunā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, karontassa pade pade.
tika-vin10t1:1559: Pañcannaṃ sahadhammīnaṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1594: Kammavācā hi kātabbā, dātabbo tassa tena ca.
tika-vin10t1:1600: Chedaṃ vā vattabhedaṃ vā, akatvāva sadā vase.
tika-vin10t1:1602: Parivāso visodhetuṃ, na sakkā tattha ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:1603: Nikkhipitvāna taṃ vattaṃ, vatthabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:1605: Tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā, puggale vāpi nikkhipe;
tika-vin10t1:1606: Nikkhipāmīti vattaṃ vā, parivāsanti vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:1618: Gumbena vatiyā vāpi, channaṭṭhāne ṭhitena tu.
tika-vin10t1:1623: Nikkhipitvā tato vattaṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1624: Antoyevāruṇe bhikkhu, gato ce yassa kassaci.
tika-vin10t1:1626: Ārocetvāva taṃ vattaṃ, nikkhipe puna paṇḍito;
tika-vin10t1:1636: Ekaccaṃ sakalaṃ vāpi, dātabbo vimatissa vā.
tika-vin10t1:1650: Tathā sambahulāsvekā, dve vā sambahulāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1651: Yā yā cirapaṭicchannā, tāsaṃ agghavasena hi.
tika-vin10t1:1657: Sabbātā ekato katvā, dātabbo missako mato.
tika-vin10t1:1662: Tattha yā apaṭicchannā, hoti āpatti yassa tu;
tika-vin10t1:1674: Nikkhipe santike tesaṃ, vattaṃ tesu gatesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:1686: Chādetvā vāpi āpattiṃ, acchādetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:1699: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1706: Na karoti anāpattiṃ, itthīnaṃ tu satampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1718: Anandhābadhiro viññū, itthī vā purisopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:1721: Andho abadhiro vāpi, badhiro vāpi cakkhumā;
tika-vin10t1:1728: Cīvaraṃ chabbidhaṃ vuttaṃ, jātito pana kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1736: Ekāhampi vinā bhikkhu, na vaseyya ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1739: Rajitvā kappiyaṃ binduṃ, datvā tattha ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1743: Muṭṭhittikā ca tiriyaṃ, uttamantena sā pana.
tika-vin10t1:1759: Tīṇipi dvepi cekaṃ vā, chinditabbaṃ pahoti ce;
tika-vin10t1:1763: Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dubbhogena ca sevato.
tika-vin10t1:1780: Eko tantupi acchinno, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindati;
tika-vin10t1:1783: Paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā, pacchā chindati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t1:1784: Ghaṭetvā koṭiyo dve vā, pacchā chindati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:1813: Gaṇanaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā, na parikkhāracoḷake;
tika-vin10t1:1826: Puna paccuddharitvā taṃ, vikappeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1828: Tāva kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ, yāva rogo na sammati;
tika-vin10t1:1859: Vuttattā ca nisedhetuṃ, na sakkā vinayaññunā.
tika-vin10t1:1868: Dukkaṭaṃ tiriṭe vāpi, veṭhane kañcukepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:1886: Bhikkhuno pana tenassa, vippavatthuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:1890: Aruṇe uṭṭhite kiṃ nu, kātabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:1893: Tabbhayā pana so bhikkhu, naggo gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1896: Na tassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ atthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:1898: Nigāsetvā gahetvā ca, gantvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:1902: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pārupanādisu.
tika-vin10t1:1907: There ca dahare maggaṃ, gacchantesu ubhosupi;
tika-vin10t1:1911: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, na passambhati nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1914: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1917: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t1:1927: Paccāsāya tato uddhaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1935: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā bhuttaṃ, vatthaṃ aññātikāya yo;
tika-vin10t1:1939: Tathā sesehi ca dvīhi, dīpitaṃ dukkaṭadvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1941: Sikkhamānāya vā hatthe, dhovanatthāya deti ce;
tika-vin10t1:1942: Sā hutvā upasampannā, pacchā dhovati so nayo.
tika-vin10t1:1951: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, sace dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:1953: ‘‘Dhovā’’ti bhikkhunī vuttā, sace sabbaṃ karoti sā;
tika-vin10t1:1963: Tāya dhovāpane vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:1965: Avuttā paribhuttaṃ vā, aññaṃ vā yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t1:1984: Aññaṃ pana parikkhāraṃ, na doso hoti gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:1995: Aññassatthāya vā tassa, ñātake vā pavārite.
tika-vin10t1:2004: Yassa tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, dve vā ekampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2005: Dve vā ekampi vā tena, sāditabbaṃ na kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t1:2015: Cīvare pana yo tassa, lābhā nissaggiyaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:2029: Akappiyaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2031: Rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ vā, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:2032: Atthāya gaṇhituṃ kiñci, dīyamānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2037: Netvā akappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, itthaṃ koci sace vade;
tika-vin10t1:2040: Ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā, cetiyaṃ vā karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t1:2041: Na ca vaṭṭati taṃ vatthuṃ, sabbesaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2043: Anāmasitvā saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ vā puggalampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:2046: Taṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nisedhetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2053: Gahaṇaṃ paribhogo vā, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:2056: Iccevaṃ pana vatvā ce, deti sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2058: Kārāpeti ca kedāre, chindāpetvā vanaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:2062: Bhāgaṃ dethā’’ti vatvā ce, uṭṭhāpeti kahāpaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:2071: Rajjuyā vāpi daṇḍena, khettaṃ mināti yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:2073: Khale vā rakkhati ṭhatvā, khalatopi tato puna;
tika-vin10t1:2080: Āharanti ca yaṃ vuttā, sabbesaṃ tamakappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2085: ‘‘Gāvo demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2089: Kappiyena ca vākyena, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2091: Hatthiṃ vā mahisaṃ assaṃ, goṇaṃ kukkuṭasūkaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2092: Dentesu ca manussesu, na ca vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2094: Paṭisiddhepi saṅghassa, datvā gacchati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:2095: Mūlaṃ datvā ca saṅghassa, keci gaṇhanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2101: Yadi codetiyeva cha, codanā diguṇā ṭhiti.
tika-vin10t1:2112: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevamānassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2122: Anāpatti tulaṃ vāpi, bahuṃ vā sabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2129: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi, tatiyaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2132: Channaṃ orena vassānaṃ, karontassa ca santhataṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2136: Kataṃ vā pana aññena, labhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:2152: Gacchante pana yāne vā, hatthiassādikesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:2158: Yāne pana agacchante, asse vā hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2167: Suttakena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2171: Yo caññavihito vāpi, āpatti yadi gacchati.
tika-vin10t1:2176: Nivāsatthāya vā gantvā, harantassa tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2177: Acchinnaṃ vāpi nissaṭṭhaṃ, labhitvā haratopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2196: Muttā maṇi silā saṅkho, pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅkako;
tika-vin10t1:2203: Suttaṃ vatthaṃ halaṃ phālaṃ, kappiyaṃ evamādikaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2206: Sampaṭicchati yo bhikkhu, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2209: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthumpi, sabbatthāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2217: ‘‘Idaṃ ayyassa hotū’’ti, vutte vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t1:2220: Paṭikkhittepi taṃ vatthuṃ, ṭhapetvā yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:2221: Tathā gopāyitabbaṃ taṃ, yathā taṃ na vinassati.
tika-vin10t1:2224: Iccevaṃ bhikkhuno vattuṃ, na vaṭṭati akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2230: Gahetuṃ aññato laddhaṃ, bhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2232: Yaṃ kiñci pana sambhūtaṃ, paccayaṃ vatthuto tato;
tika-vin10t1:2245: Vatthuṃ nissaggiyassāpi, vatthuṃ vā dukkaṭassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:2246: Kappiyassa ca vatthuṃ vā, yo nissaggiyavatthunā.
tika-vin10t1:2251: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vā kappiyassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:2255: Parivatteti yo tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2261: Tena dve dukkaṭā honti, cetāpentassa rūpiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2276: Tasmā mātāpitūnampi, vatthuṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2279: Sakaṃ vā deti ce bhaṇḍaṃ, evaṃ vatvāna mātuyā;
tika-vin10t1:2280: Mātuyā vā tathā bhaṇḍaṃ, sayaṃ gaṇhāti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2285: ‘‘Gahetvā vā idaṃ nāma, bhuñjitvā odanaṃ imaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2286: Idaṃ nāma karohī’’ti, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2289: Challiṃ vā pana valliṃ vā, kaṭṭhaṃ vā dārumeva vā.
tika-vin10t1:2302: Nissaggiye ca vatthumhi, naṭṭhe bhuttepi vā yathā;
tika-vin10t1:2308: ‘‘Idaṃ mamatthi attho me, iminā’’ti ca bhāsato;
tika-vin10t1:2314: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā tu, ukkaṭṭho majjhimomako.
tika-vin10t1:2319: Ukkaṭṭho nāma so patto, yo taṃ sabbaṃ tu gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t1:2320: Majjhimo tassupaḍḍho ca, tadupaḍḍho ca omako.
tika-vin10t1:2323: Evaṃ majjhimaomesu, nava pattā bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t1:2326: Tasmā nāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ, na gacchanti vikappanaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2334: Yaṃ pattaṃ na vikappeti, yaṃ nādhiṭṭheti vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2349: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ, anissajjeva bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t1:2364: Yaṃ kiñci sodakaṃ pattaṃ, paṭisāmeyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2367: Bhikkhuno sodakaṃ pattaṃ, otāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2370: Miḍḍhante paribhaṇḍante, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2371: Miḍḍhiyā paribhaṇḍe vā, vitthiṇṇe pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2382: Daṇḍe vā nāgadante vā, laggetumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2389: Bhattapūropi vā chatte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2392: Kavāṭaṃ na paṇāmeyya, pattahattho sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:2398: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā, dhovituṃ hatthameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2399: Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ patte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2401: Anāpatti dasāhassa, antoyeva ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2408: Pañcabandhanaūnasmiṃ, patte sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2409: Viññāpeyya navaṃ pattaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2414: Pañca vā rājiyo yassa, ekā vāpi dasaṅgulā;
tika-vin10t1:2415: Apatto nāmayaṃ patto, viññāpeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2418: Baddho vaṭṭati maṭṭho ce, ayocuṇṇena vāṇiyā.
tika-vin10t1:2420: Pattaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:2423: Dīyamāne tu pattasmiṃ, yassa so na ca ruccati;
tika-vin10t1:2424: Appicchatāya vā pattaṃ, taṃ na gaṇhāti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2431: Sace so taṃ jigucchanto, appadese ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t1:2434: Naṭṭhe bhinnepi vā patte, anāpatti pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t1:2435: Attano ñātakādīnaṃ, gaṇhato vā dhanena vā.
tika-vin10t1:2444: Tato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2451: Sarīrabhoge netabbaṃ, sāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2456: Sayaṃ tāpeti ce bhikkhu, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2457: Tāpanaṃ navanītassa, sāmapāko na hoti so.
tika-vin10t1:2459: Pacchābhattaṃ gahetvā ce, yena kenaci tāpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2460: Vaṭṭateva ca taṃ sappi, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2467: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2477: Khīraṃ dadhi ca sappi ca, navanītañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2479: ‘‘Yesaṃ kappati maṃsañhi, tesaṃ sappī’’ti kiṃ idaṃ?
tika-vin10t1:2489: Telaṃ vā navanītaṃ vā, sappiṃ vā ākiranti hi.
tika-vin10t1:2491: Bhattasitthāni vā tattha, taṇḍulā vā bhavanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:2506: Attanā yaṃ kataṃ telaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2522: Vasānaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, telaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t1:2530: Sace anupasampanno, katvā taṃ deti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2533: Paṭiggahetuṃ kātuṃ vā, pacchābhattaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2545: Phāṇitaṃ tu purebhattaṃ, gahitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2552: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2555: Hoti tassa anāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ katepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2558: Tadahe deti ce katvā, sāmisampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2567: Pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīraṃ, hoti taṃ yāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2575: Labhitvā pana nissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tu sattāhakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2576: Aruādīni makkhetuṃ, sāyituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2578: Aññassa pana bhikkhussa, kāyabhoge ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2595: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā.
tika-vin10t1:2603: Ovassāpeti ce kāyaṃ, naggo satipi cīvare;
tika-vin10t1:2616: Sāmaṃ tu cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindantassa taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t1:2628: Āṇāpeti sace aññaṃ, bhikkhuṃ gaṇhāti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2632: Ekāyassa ca vācāya, honti āpattiyo bahū.
tika-vin10t1:2646: So vā deti sace tuṭṭho, duṭṭho vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:2663: Vīte nissaggiyaṃ vuttaṃ, phalake phalakepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:2674: Sace akappiyaṃ suttaṃ, vāreneva vinanti te;
tika-vin10t1:2680: Dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā vā, ekato vā vinanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:2694: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2710: Vassacchedo na kātabbo, saṅghikaṃ taṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t1:2718: Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t1:2726: Ṭhapetvā cīvaraṃ gāme, paccaye sati tādise.
tika-vin10t1:2729: Uttariṃ vasato doso, vinā saṅghassa sammutiṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2737: Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin10t1:2738: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2746: Gāmasīmampi vā gantvā, vasitvā yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:2747: Cīvarassa pavattiṃ so, ñatvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2750: Khippaṃ paccuddhare ṭhāne, atireke hi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t1:2759: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:2765: Cīvaraṃ vā parasseka-mekaṃ vā pana attano;
tika-vin10t1:2766: Pariṇāmeyya ce saddhiṃ, dve pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2768: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, taṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:2771: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, puggalassapi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2797: Bhūtena vā abhūtena, yena kenaci vatthunā.
tika-vin10t1:2799: Yāya kāyaci bhāsāya, hatthamuddāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2827: Na ceva piyakāmassa, na ca bhedatthinopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:2835: Dhammaṃ saha bhaṇantassa, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2840: Dukkaṭaṃ hoti bhikkhusmiṃ, tathā bhikkhuniyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:2843: Ekato uddisāpeti, sajjhāyaṃ vā karoti yo;
tika-vin10t1:2844: Bhaṇantaṃ paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ, opāteti ca yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:2847: Uddesaṃ tu anāpatti, bhaṇane tena ekato.
tika-vin10t1:2856: Tissannaṃ pana rattīnaṃ, uddhaṃ yo pana rattiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2857: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ aññena, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2859: Vatthuṃ yaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, methunassa pahonakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2863: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, sace bhikkhu nipajjati.
tika-vin10t1:2868: Sace pidhāya vā gabbhaṃ, nipajjatipidhāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:2883: Anāpatti dirattaṃ vā, tirattaṃ vasato saha;
tika-vin10t1:2897: Rattiyaṃ yo nipajjeyya, deviyā paṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin10t1:2907: Vinā dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa, hoti pācitti itthiyā.
tika-vin10t1:2912: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, padādīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t1:2918: Ṭhitassa mātugāmassa, dhammaṃ yo pana bhāsati;
tika-vin10t1:2919: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2922: Uttari chahi vācāhi, vadato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:2927: Purise sati viññusmiṃ, sayaṃ uṭṭhāya vā puna;
tika-vin10t1:2930: Aññissā puna aññissā, itthiyā bhaṇatopi ca;
tika-vin10t1:2938: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṃ bhikkhuṃ, bhūte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2940: No ce jānāti so vuttaṃ, ārocentassa bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:2949: Kāyato vācato kāya-vācato ca tidhā siyā;
tika-vin10t1:2960: Tasmā suddhassa duṭṭhullaṃ, vadaṃ pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t1:2968: Vatthuṃ vā pana āpattiṃ, ārocentassa kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2975: Khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya, pathaviṃ yo akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2976: Bhedāpeyya ca bhindeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:2985: Iccevaṃ tu vadantassa, koci doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:2987: ‘‘Imaṃ khaṇa ca okāsaṃ, idha pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇa;
tika-vin10t1:2988: Imasmiṃ khaṇa okāse’’, vattumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2990: ‘‘Kandaṃ khaṇa kurundaṃ vā, thūṇaṃ khaṇa ca khāṇukaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2991: Mūlaṃ khaṇa ca tālaṃ vā’’, evaṃ vadati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2993: ‘‘Imaṃ mūlaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ tālaṃ imaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:2994: Khaṇā’’ti niyametvāna, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:2997: Bhikkhunā apanetabbo, bahalaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3002: Sace patati toyasmiṃ, deve vuṭṭhepi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3005: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ soṇḍiṃ, khaṇanti yadi tattha tu;
tika-vin10t1:3006: Rajaṃ patati ce pubbaṃ, pacchā devobhivassati.
tika-vin10t1:3011: Vārinā paṭhamaṃ puṇṇe, pacchā patati ce rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3012: Taṃ vaṭṭati vikopetuṃ, toye devo hi vassati.
tika-vin10t1:3020: Abbhokāse sace vaṭṭho, cātumāsaṃ tu vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3039: Anovaṭṭho ca bhikkhūnaṃ, sabbadā hoti kappiyo.
tika-vin10t1:3041: Vuṭṭhe puna ca gehasmiṃ, gehaṃ chādenti taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t1:3044: Yattakaṃ tattha tintaṃ tu, tattakaṃ hotyakappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3045: Atintaṃ tattha yaṃ yaṃ tu, taṃ taṃ hoti hi kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3047: Temito vārinā so ce, ekābaddhova bhūmiyā;
tika-vin10t1:3048: Pathavī ceva sā jātā, na vaṭṭati tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3053: Tattha laggaṃ rajaṃ saṇhaṃ, aghaṃsantova mattaso;
tika-vin10t1:3057: Ṭhāne tiṭṭhati so tasmā, vikopeyya yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3059: Abbhokāse ṭhitaṃ thambhaṃ, cāletvā panito cito;
tika-vin10t1:3060: Pathaviṃ tu vikopetvā, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3062: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ vā, khāṇukaṃ vāpi gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:3063: Ayameva nayo doso, ujumuddharato na ca.
tika-vin10t1:3065: Pāsāṇaṃ yadi vā rukkhaṃ, uccāletvā pavaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3066: Na doso suddhacittassa, sace pathavi bhijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3071: Kaṇṭakaṃ sūcimaṭṭhiṃ vā, khilaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:3072: Ākoṭetuṃ pavesetuṃ, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3075: Bhikkhussa pana passāva-mevaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3078: Samajjato samaṃ kātuṃ, ghaṃsituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3080: Pādaṅguṭṭhena vā bhūmiṃ, likhitumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3081: Bhindantena ca pādehi, tathā caṅkamitumpi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3084: Aghaṃsanto gahetvā ce, hatthaṃ dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3086: Sayaṃ dahati ce bhūmiṃ, dahāpeti parehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3089: Ṭhānesu yattakesvaggiṃ, deti dāpeti vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3092: Ṭhapetuṃ bhikkhuno aggiṃ, bhūmiyaṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3095: Aggiṃ upari dārūnaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3096: Dahanto tāni gantvā so, bhūmiṃ dahati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:3102: Khāṇuke sukkharukkhe vā, aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3104: Anāpatti tiṇukkaṃ tu, gahetvā pana gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:3105: Ḍayhamāne tu hatthasmiṃ, sace pāteti bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3107: Puna taṃ patitaṭṭhāne, datvā tassa panindhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3121: Udakaṭṭho thalaṭṭhoti, duvidho hoti so pana;
tika-vin10t1:3125: Vikopentassa taṃ sabbaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3127: Viyūhitvā tu hatthena, nhāyituṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3128: Hoti tassa ca sabbampi, ṭhānañhi sakalaṃ jalaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3130: Udakena vinā cecca, taṃ panuddharituṃ jalā;
tika-vin10t1:3131: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhussa, ṭhānasaṅkamanañhi taṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3137: Vikopentassa vā tattha, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3140: Gacchanti hi yato tāni, bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3146: Tasmā tassa kato hoti, bījagāmena saṅgaho.
tika-vin10t1:3149: Aphalitāya yo khāṇu, bhūtagāmena so mato.
tika-vin10t1:3151: Phalitā kadalī yāva, nīlapaṇṇā ca tāva sā;
tika-vin10t1:3154: Aggato pana paṭṭhāya, yadāyaṃ veḷu sussati;
tika-vin10t1:3163: Mūlamattepi vā yesaṃ, paṇṇamattepi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3167: Pattavaṭṭi yadā nīlā, niggacchati tadā na ca.
tika-vin10t1:3180: Vandākā vāpi aññaṃ vā, rukkhe jāyati yaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t1:3182: Rukkhovassa siyā ṭhānaṃ, vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3186: Yāva dve tīṇi pattāni, na sañjāyanti tāva so.
tika-vin10t1:3188: Pattesu pana jātesu, vatthu pācittiyassa so;
tika-vin10t1:3189: Ghaṃsitvā pana taṃ tasmā, apanetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3198: Sace taṃ makuḷaṃ hoti, hoti dukkaṭavatthukaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3200: Rukkhe tacaṃ vikopetvā, tathā pappaṭikampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:3201: Niyyāsampi panallasmiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3206: Pupphaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā pakkameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:3209: Nāmetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, dātuṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:3210: Sayaṃ khāditukāmo ce, dātumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3215: Yesaṃ ruhati rukkhānaṃ, sākhā tesampi sākhinaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3221: ‘‘Rukkhaṃ chinda lataṃ chinda, kandaṃ mūlampi uddhara;
tika-vin10t1:3224: ‘‘Ambaṃ jambumpi nimbaṃ vā, chinda bhinduddharā’’ti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3227: ‘‘Imaṃ rukkhaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ challiṃ imaṃ lataṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3228: Chinda bhindā’’ti vā vattuṃ, niyametvā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3231: Sabbameva kataṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ kappiye kate.
tika-vin10t1:3233: Ekato pana baddhāni, ucchudārūni honti ce;
tika-vin10t1:3234: Kappiyaṃ karonto pana, dāruṃ vijjhati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3236: Valliyā rajjuyā vāpi, yāya baddhāni tāni hi;
tika-vin10t1:3237: Bhājanena samānattā, taṃ vijjhati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3245: Kaṭāhaṃ yadi muñcitvā, anto carati miñjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3246: Bhindāpetvā kapitthaṃ taṃ, kāretabbaṃ tu kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3262: Kamme aropite cevaṃ, vadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3281: Vadato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, yassa kassaci santike.
tika-vin10t1:3287: Ajjhokāse tu mañcādiṃ, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:3290: Nevuddhareyya saṅghassa, uddharāpeyya vā na taṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3291: Pakkamanto sace tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3293: Vassike caturo māse, sace devo na vassati;
tika-vin10t1:3294: Ajjhokāse tathā cāpi, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3296: Yattha vassati hemante, cattāro aparepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:3297: Ṭhapetuṃ tattha mañcādiṃ, aṭṭha māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3300: Mañcādiṃ pana saṅghassa, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3302: Aññassatthāya yaṃ kiñci, santhataṃ yadi saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3303: Yattha katthaci vā ṭhāne, yena kenaci bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:3305: Yāva so na nisīdeyya, ‘‘gacchā’’ti na vadeyya vā;
tika-vin10t1:3311: Santhataṃ bhikkhunā taṃ ce, bhāro tasseva tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3312: Yāva āṇāpako tattha, āgantvā na nisīdati.
tika-vin10t1:3323: Nikkhamitvā sace tasmā, ṭhānā aññattha gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:3333: Abbhokāse ṭhapetvā taṃ, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3335: Sace āraññakenāpi, anovasse ca no sati;
tika-vin10t1:3336: Laggetvā pana rukkhasmiṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3338: Yathā upacikādīhi, na khajjati na lujjati;
tika-vin10t1:3339: Tathā katvāpi taṃ sabbaṃ, gantuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3354: Etaṃ dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ, santharitvāpi vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3358: Paṭhame dukkaṭaṃ pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3372: Sāpekkhova ca gantvā taṃ, tattha ṭhatvāpi pucchati;
tika-vin10t1:3376: Yo pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ, jānaṃ anupakhajja ca;
tika-vin10t1:3380: Yāva taṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vā, nikkhamantassa vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3388: Nisīdantassa vā tattha, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3398: Sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nivāso ca nivārito.
tika-vin10t1:3407: Vihārā saṅghikā bhikkhuṃ, nikkaḍḍheyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3408: Nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā kuddho, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3411: Nikkaḍḍheti sace tassa, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:3413: Ṭhapetvā ca ṭhapetvā ca, nikkaḍḍhantassa antarā;
tika-vin10t1:3419: Sace so sakimāṇatto, dvārepi bahuke pana;
tika-vin10t1:3423: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, tathā nikkaḍḍhanepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:3442: Āhaccapādake mañce, pīṭhe vā pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3444: Nisīdantassa vā tasmiṃ, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3448: Heṭṭhā aparibhoge vā, sīsaghaṭṭāya vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3453: Yattha paṭāṇi vā dinnā, tattha ṭhatvā lageti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3463: Adhiṭṭheyyaṃ tato uddhaṃ, adhiṭṭheti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3464: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, dukkaṭaṃ tattha tiṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t1:3467: Yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ, olokento na passati.
tika-vin10t1:3469: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne pana ṭhātuṃ, neva bhikkhussa vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:3475: Na doso dvattipariyāye, leṇe tiṇakuṭīsu vā;
tika-vin10t1:3479: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā mattikampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3480: Yadi siñceyya pācitti, siñcāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3482: Acchinditvā sace dhāraṃ, mattikaṃ siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t1:3488: Ekāva ce siyāpatti, divasampi ca sandatu;
tika-vin10t1:3495: Khayaṃ vā āvilattaṃ vā, jalaṃ gacchati tādise.
tika-vin10t1:3523: Osārentova te dhamme, ovadeyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3539: Ṭhapetvā dukkaṭaṃ bālaṃ, gilānaṃ gamikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3541: Adhamme pana kammasmiṃ, adhammanti ca saññino;
tika-vin10t1:3545: Nava pācittiyo vuttā, samaggepi ca tattakā.
tika-vin10t1:3547: Navakānaṃ vasā dvinnaṃ, aṭṭhārasa bhavanti tā;
tika-vin10t1:3550: ‘‘Osārehī’’ti vutto vā, pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti vā;
tika-vin10t1:3566: Catūsvapi nikāyesu, eko vā potthakopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:3598: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, sace vadati tīṇipi.
tika-vin10t1:3617: Vadato sammate bhikkhu, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3629: Sace bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu, dadeyya pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3635: Tattha bhikkhuniyā dinnaṃ, cīvaraṃ idha bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:3639: Cīvaraṃ yo hi sibbeyya, sibbāpeyya parena vā;
tika-vin10t1:3642: Yaṃ vā nivāsituṃ sakkā, yaṃ vā pārupanūpagaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3645: Sayaṃ sūciṃ pavesetvā, sibbantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:3649: Ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, payogassa vasā bahū.
tika-vin10t1:3652: Niṭṭhāpeti sace sabbaṃ, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3654: ‘‘Yamettha cīvare kammaṃ, bhāro sabbaṃ tavā’’ti hi;
tika-vin10t1:3655: Āṇatto bhikkhunā sabbaṃ, niṭṭhāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:3661: Kā hi nāma kathā atthi? Tikapācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3674: Paṭipajjeyya maggaṃ ce, aññatra samayā idha.
tika-vin10t1:3677: Agāmake araññe vā, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3719: Tathā saṃvidahitvā vā, tiriyaṃ taraṇāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:3726: Bhojanaṃ pañcadhā vuttaṃ, gahaṇe tassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3738: Aññaṃ vā pana yaṃ kiñci, ṭhapetvā pañcabhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3754: Bhuñjitabbaṃ sakiṃ tattha, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:3756: Dutiye divase tattha, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3762: Nānāṭṭhānesu paññatto, yo ca, nānākulehi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3763: Bhuñjato pana sabbattha, na doso paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin10t1:3766: Ādito pana paṭṭhāya, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:3769: Odissapi ca paññatte, paritte bhuñjato sakiṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3776: Gaṇoti pana niddiṭṭhā, cattāro vā tatuttariṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3778: Yaṃ nimantanato vāpi, laddhaṃ viññattitopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3779: Bhojanaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, hoti aññataraṃ idha.
tika-vin10t1:3782: Nimanteti sace bhikkhū, cattāro bahukepi vā.
tika-vin10t1:3787: Tato tassa ca te bhikkhū, sādiyitvā nimantanaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3788: Ekato nānato vā ce, gantvā gaṇhanti ekato.
tika-vin10t1:3793: Ekato nānato vāpi, gamanaṃ bhojanampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:3794: Kāraṇanti na taṃ viññū, bhaṇanti gaṇabhojane.
tika-vin10t1:3799: Nānato vekato gantvā, sace gaṇhanti ekato;
tika-vin10t1:3806: Gahetvā ekato dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā bhuñjataṃ tathā.
tika-vin10t1:3815: Nattheva ca visaṅketaṃ, yāguādīsu taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:3835: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, yena kena nimantito;
tika-vin10t1:3836: Taṃ ṭhapetvā sace aññaṃ, bhojanaṃ paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t1:3841: Yattha khīraṃ rasaṃ vāpi, ākiranti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:3851: Nimantitassa vā nicca-bhatte doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3858: Pātheyyatthāya manthā vā, ye hi tattha ca bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:3861: Tato ce uttariṃ tassa, hoti pācitti gaṇhato.
tika-vin10t1:3864: Gahitā pana pūvā’’ti, bhikkhuṃ disvā vade budho.
tika-vin10t1:3867: Gaṇhatopi ca taṃ sutvā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3872: Yena tattha tayo laddhā, pattapūrā tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:3873: Dve saṅghassa padātabbā, dve ce eko, na ekato.
tika-vin10t1:3888: Odano sattu kummāso, maccho maṃsanti sabbaso;
tika-vin10t1:3891: Odano tattha sattannaṃ, dhaññānaṃ odano mato;
tika-vin10t1:3897: Sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, varako godhumo tathā;
tika-vin10t1:3903: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, odano yāgu vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3906: Hatthena gahitokāse, odhiṃ dasseti yā pana;
tika-vin10t1:3909: Abbhuṇhā pana yā yāgu, uddhanoropitā tanu;
tika-vin10t1:3910: Sace odhiṃ na dasseti, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3912: Puna sā sītalībhūtā, ghanabhāvaṃ gatā sace;
tika-vin10t1:3913: Odhiṃ dasseti so pubbe, tanubhāvo na rakkhati.
tika-vin10t1:3919: Odhiṃ pana ca dasseti, sañjaneti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3922: ‘‘Yāguṃ gaṇhatha, yāgu’’nti, vatvā denti sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:3925: Taṃ pacitvā sace denti, yāgusaṅgahitā pana.
tika-vin10t1:3936: Puthukā vā tato tāhi, katabhattampi sattupi;
tika-vin10t1:3937: Suddhā na pana pūvā vā, pavārenti kadācipi.
tika-vin10t1:3940: Koṭṭetvā denti taṃ cuṇṇaṃ, sattusaṅgahitaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3942: Bhajjitānaṃ tu vīhīnaṃ, na pavārenti taṇḍulā;
tika-vin10t1:3943: Tesaṃ pana ca yaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, taṃ janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3949: Kuṇḍakaṃ pana vīhīnaṃ, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3951: Lājā vā pana teheva, katabhattampi sattu vā;
tika-vin10t1:3952: Khajjakaṃ pana suddhaṃ vā, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3955: Yaṃ kiñci bhajjitaṃ piṭṭhaṃ, na pavāreti suddhakaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3961: Na so tena pavāreti, avatthuttāti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3966: Maṃsaṃ pana ca khādanto, kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:3970: Nisedhaṃ na pavāreti, tathā aññaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3973: Patte hatthe mukhe vāpi, bhojanaṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:3976: Pavāreti sace natthi, na pavāreti katthaci.
tika-vin10t1:3978: Gilitvā ca mukhe bhattaṃ, sesamādāya gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:3979: Antarā ca nisedhento, na pavāreti bhojanaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3986: Asanassa upacchedā, na pavāreti soti hi;
tika-vin10t1:3989: Gaṇhato pacchimaṃ aṅgaṃ, dadato purimaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:3990: Ubhinnaṃ aḍḍhateyyaṃ ce, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:3995: Hatthe ādhārake vāpi, pattaṃ ūrūsu vā ṭhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4005: Pidahanto sakaṃ pattaṃ, hatthehi na pavārito.
tika-vin10t1:4008: Kāyena vāpi vācāya, hoti kassa pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4013: Sace vadati tassāpi, na panatthi pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4016: Samaṃsañhi rasaṃ netvā, gaṇhathāti rasaṃ vade;
tika-vin10t1:4017: Taṃ sutvā ca nisedhento, neva hoti pavārito.
tika-vin10t1:4022: Sace maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā, ‘‘gaṇha maṃsarasa’’nti vā;
tika-vin10t1:4023: Vadeyyatthi ca maṃsaṃ ce, paṭikkhepe pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4031: Vadanti ce paṭikkhepe, neva hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4037: Eseva ca nayo vutto, ñeyyo maṃsakarambake;
tika-vin10t1:4046: ‘‘Yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhā’’ti, vutte tattha ca yāgu ce;
tika-vin10t1:4047: Samā bahutarā vā sā, na pavāreti so kira.
tika-vin10t1:4049: Mandā yāgu, bahuṃ bhattaṃ, sace hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t1:4050: Idaṃ sabbattha niddiṭṭhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ pana duddasaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4052: Rasaṃ bahurase bhatte, khīraṃ vā bahukhīrake;
tika-vin10t1:4053: Gaṇhathāti visuṃ katvā, deti natthi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t1:4058: Udakaṃ vāpi patvā so, sace tiṭṭhati kaddamaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4059: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tato puna.
tika-vin10t1:4061: Pīṭhake yo nisīditvā, pavāreti sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:4064: Sace mañce nisīditvā, pavāreti tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:4065: Ito saṃsarituṃ etto, īsakampi na labbhati.
tika-vin10t1:4067: Tena mañcena naṃ saddhiṃ, vaṭṭataññatra nenti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4076: Kappiyaṃ pana kātabbaṃ, na patteyeva kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4077: Pacchiyaṃ yadi vā kuṇḍe, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhājane.
tika-vin10t1:4085: Byañjanaṃ vāpi yaṃ kiñci, patte tassākiranti ce.
tika-vin10t1:4087: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tathā puna;
tika-vin10t1:4088: Yena taṃ akataṃ yaṃ vā, kātabbaṃ tena taṃ visuṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4093: Yopi pātova ekampi, sitthaṃ bhutvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t1:4110: Jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho, bhutte pācitti tassa tu.
tika-vin10t1:4112: Dukkaṭaṃ abhihāre ca, gahaṇe itarassa hi;
tika-vin10t1:4136: Mūlaṃ kandaṃ muḷālañca, matthakaṃ khandhakaṃ tacaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4137: Pattaṃ pupphaṃ phalaṃ aṭṭhi, piṭṭhaṃ niyyāsameva ca.
tika-vin10t1:4146: Saṅgahaṃ idha gacchanti, āhāratthaṃ pharanti hi.
tika-vin10t1:4148: Chaḍḍenti jaraṭṭhaṃ chetvā, yaṃ taṃ vajakalissa tu;
tika-vin10t1:4181: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, kaḷīro sāsapassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4199: Vatthulo cīnamuggo ca, ummā vajakalī tathā.
tika-vin10t1:4201: Jajjharī kāsamaddo ca, sellu siggu ca nāḷikā;
tika-vin10t1:4204: Rājamāso ca māso ca, nipphāvo migapupphikā;
tika-vin10t1:4217: Tathā pupphaṃ karīrassa, pupphaṃ varuṇakassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4237: Labujassa ca cocassa, mocassa madhukassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4263: Tālapiṭṭhaṃ tathā dhotaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ yaṃ khīravalliyā;
tika-vin10t1:4282: Bhojanaṃ sannidhiṃ katvā, khādanaṃ vāpi yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:4283: Bhuñjeyya vāpi khādeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4286: Nidahitvā sace tassa, denti taṃ puna vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4289: Dutiye divase tassa, nihitaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4303: Thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, maṃse mānusake siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4304: Sese akappiye maṃse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4310: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṃ pana vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin10t1:4330: Kālo yāmo ca sattāhaṃ, iti kālattayaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4331: Atikkamayato doso, kālaṃ taṃ taṃ tu kālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4343: Gahitaṃ tadahe vāpi, dvayaṃ pubbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4346: Iti vuttaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, mahāpaccariyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t1:4349: Taṃ taṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ kāla-manatikkamma bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:4361: Viññāpetvā tathā taṃ ce, dukkaṭaṃ paṭigaṇhato;
tika-vin10t1:4376: Yena yena hi viññattaṃ, tasmiṃ mūlepi tassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:4377: Laddhepi pana taṃ laddhaṃ, hotiyeva na aññathā.
tika-vin10t1:4385: Akappiyena vuttepi, sappinā deti tena ce;
tika-vin10t1:4402: Manusso vāmanusso vā, deti kāyādinā tidhā.
tika-vin10t1:4404: Paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ bhikkhu, dīyamānaṃ sace dvidhā;
tika-vin10t1:4407: Dāyako gaganaṭṭho ce, bhūmaṭṭho cetaro siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4411: Dātuṃ vāpi gahetuṃ vā, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4414: Evarūpe pana ṭhāne, ṭhatvā ce deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4416: Pakkhī vā mukhatuṇḍena, hatthī soṇḍāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4417: Sace yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4423: Tena hatthaṃ pasāretvā, heṭṭhimaṃ pana bhājanaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4425: Paṭicchitabbaṃ taṃ eka- desenāpi ca bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4428: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ sabbaṃ, oropetvā yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4429: Ugghāṭetvā tato iṭṭhaṃ, gahetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4432: Kājabhattaṃ haranto ce, onatvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4434: Tiṃsahattho siyā veḷu, antesu ca duve ghaṭā;
tika-vin10t1:4437: Bahupattā ca mañce vā, pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake;
tika-vin10t1:4438: Ṭhapitā dāyako hattha-pāse ṭhatvāna deti ce.
tika-vin10t1:4441: Nisīdati phusitvā yo, yañca pattesu dīyati.
tika-vin10t1:4443: Gahitaṃ tena taṃ sabbaṃ, hotiyeva na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t1:4446: Gahitaṃ hoti taṃ sabbaṃ, āruhitvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t1:4447: Āhacca kucchiyā kucchiṃ, ṭhitā pattā hi bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4449: Yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vāpi, phusitvā sūciyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4450: Nisinno tattha tattheva, dīyamānaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4456: Na panetāni kāyena, paṭibaddhāni honti hi.
tika-vin10t1:4459: Khāṇubaddhepi vā mañce, gahaṇaṃ neva rūhati.
tika-vin10t1:4467: Sace patte rajo hoti, dhovitabbo jale sati;
tika-vin10t1:4470: Piṇḍāya vicarantassa, rajaṃ patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:4477: Asutvānādiyitvā vā, denti ce natthi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4480: Sace rajaṃ nipāteti, mahāvāto tato tato.
tika-vin10t1:4482: Na sakkā ca siyā bhikkhaṃ, gahetuṃ yadi bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4485: Sāmaṇerassa taṃ datvā, dinnaṃ vā tena taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4486: Tassa vissāsato vāpi, bhuñjituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4488: Bhikkhācāre sace bhattaṃ, sarajaṃ deti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4489: ‘‘Paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṃ tvaṃ, gaṇha vā bhuñja vā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t1:4491: Vattabbo so tathā tena, kattabbañceva bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4492: Rajaṃ upari bhattassa, tassuplavati ce pana.
tika-vin10t1:4495: Anto paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ tu sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:4497: Patitaṃ sukkhabhatte ce, apanīyāva taṃ rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4501: Thevo uḷuṅkato patte, sace patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4503: Bhatte ākiramāne tu, carukena tato pana;
tika-vin10t1:4504: Masi vā chārikā vāpi, sace patati bhājane.
tika-vin10t1:4509: Uppabhitvā sace patte, itarassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4512: Pāyāsassa ca pūretvā, pattaṃ ce denti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4513: Uṇhattā pana taṃ heṭṭhā, gahetuṃ na ca sakkati.
tika-vin10t1:4516: Na sakkā ce gahetabbo, tathā ādhārakenapi.
tika-vin10t1:4522: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā ce, nisinno hoti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4524: Sace hatthena muñcitvā, pattaṃ ādhārakampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4525: Pelletvā pana pādena, niddāyati hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4530: Tasmā taṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā vinayaññunā;
tika-vin10t1:4531: Yaṃ dīyamānaṃ patati, gahetuṃ taṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4533: Bhuñjantānañca dantā vā, khīyantipi nakhāpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:4534: Tathā pattassa vaṇṇo vā, abbohāranayo ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4537: Paññāyati hi taṃ tesu, siyā navasamuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4539: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ pacchā, khāditabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:4540: Na paññāyati ce tasmiṃ, malaṃ vaṭṭati khādituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4545: Bhesajjatthāya tāpetvā, vāsiṃ khīre khipanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4546: Uṭṭheti nīlikā tattha, satthake viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t1:4548: Sace āmakatakke vā, khīre vā pakkhipanti taṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4552: Patte patati ce toyaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ kāyavatthato.
tika-vin10t1:4555: Eseva ca nayo vutto, rukkhamūlepi bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:4557: Sattāhaṃ pana vassante, deve suddhaṃ jalaṃ sace;
tika-vin10t1:4558: Abbhokāsepi vā patte, toyaṃ patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4563: Paṭiggahetvā vā pattaṃ, dātabbo tassa odano;
tika-vin10t1:4564: Chupitvā deti ce bhattaṃ, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4570: Sace vadati pacchā taṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t1:4573: ‘‘Etto pūvampi bhattaṃ vā, kiñci gaṇhā’’ti bhāsati.
tika-vin10t1:4579: Taṃpaṭiggahaṇe kiccaṃ, puna tassa na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:4588: Patitaṃ hatthato tasmiṃ, na karoti akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4591: Bhuñjitabbaṃ tu taṃ katvā, pattaṃ viya nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4593: Sace yāgukuṭaṃ puṇṇaṃ, sāmaṇero hi dubbalo;
tika-vin10t1:4594: Bhikkhuṃ paṭiggahāpetuṃ, na sakkoti hi taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t1:4599: Atha vā bhūmiyaṃyeva, hatthe bhikkhu ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t1:4600: Āropeti pavaṭṭetvā, tattha ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4603: Dve tayo sāmaṇerā vā, denti ce gahaṇūpagaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4606: Ekena vā tathā dinnaṃ, gaṇhanti dve tayopi vā.
tika-vin10t1:4612: Sammujjanto ca ghaṭṭeti, na panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4615: Gaṇhitvā puna taṃ ñatvā, ṭhapetuṃ tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4617: Vivaritvā sace pubbe, ṭhapitaṃ pihitampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:4618: Tatheva taṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ na panaññathā.
tika-vin10t1:4620: Bahi ṭhapeti ce tena, chupitabbaṃ na taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4621: Yadi chupati ce ñatvā, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:4627: Paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ tu, tasmiṃ puna na vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:4629: Tālaṃ vā nāḷikeraṃ vā, āruḷho koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t1:4633: Tamañño pana bhūmaṭṭho, gahetvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4635: Chinditvā ce vatiṃ ucchuṃ, phalaṃ vā deti gaṇhituṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4638: Sace na puthulo hoti, pākāro atiuccako;
tika-vin10t1:4641: Uddhaṃ hatthasataṃ gantvā, sampattaṃ puna taṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:4644: Bhikkhuno sāmaṇeraṃ tu, khandhena vahato sace;
tika-vin10t1:4645: Phalaṃ gahetvā tattheva, nisinno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4647: Aparopi vahantova, bhikkhuṃ yo koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t1:4648: Phalaṃ khandhe nisinnassa, bhikkhuno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4650: Gahetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, chāyatthaṃ yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:4651: Puna citte samuppanne, khādituṃ pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4656: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t1:4660: Gacchanto antarāmagge, yaṃ icchati tato pana.
tika-vin10t1:4668: Taṇḍulesu hi khīṇesu, attanā gahitesu so;
tika-vin10t1:4672: Yāguṃ bhikkhussa taṃ datvā, sayaṃ pivati tassa ce.
tika-vin10t1:4680: Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4684: Na sakkoti sace te ca, taṇḍule bhājanampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:4695: Tatte panudake koci, ce pakkhipati taṇḍule;
tika-vin10t1:4696: Tato paṭṭhāya tenaggi, na kātabbova bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:4698: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ yāguṃ, pātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:4699: Sace pacati pacchā taṃ, sāmapākā na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:4702: Tasseva ca tato laddhaṃ, phalaṃ kiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4705: Kaṇṭake bandhituṃ vāpi, bhikkhuno kira vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4707: Saṇḍāsena ca dīghena, gahetvā thālakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:4708: Pacato bhikkhuno telaṃ, bhasmaṃ patati tattha ce.
tika-vin10t1:4713: Paṭiggahetvā aṅgāre, tāni dārūni vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4716: Ucchuṃ khādati ce bhikkhu, sāmaṇeropi icchati;
tika-vin10t1:4717: ‘‘Chinditvā tvamito gaṇha’’, iti vutto ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t1:4728: Udakena samā vuttā, himassa karakāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:4729: Kūpādīsu jalaṃ pātuṃ, bahalampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4731: Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne, bahalaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:4732: Sanditvā yadi taṃ gantvā, nadiṃ pūreti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4735: Na ñāyati raso tesaṃ, na paṭiggahaṇakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4738: Pakkhittāni sace honti, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ pana.
tika-vin10t1:4744: Ajānantassa pācitti, so ce visati khādato.
tika-vin10t1:4746: Sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesu, kiṃ vaṭṭati? Na vaṭṭati?
tika-vin10t1:4750: Semhaṃ siṅghāṇikā kheḷo, assu loṇanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:4752: Yaṃ panettha sakaṭṭhānā, cavitvā patitaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4753: Patte vā pana hatthe vā, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t1:4794: Udakaṃ dantaponaṃ vā, dentassa ca atitthiye;
tika-vin10t1:4795: Titthiyoti ca saññissa, dukkaṭaṃ vimatissa ca.
tika-vin10t1:4804: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, bhikkhu yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4814: Pamāṇaṃ savane cevaṃ, ajjhokāse na cetare.
tika-vin10t1:4824: Sabhojane kule tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4833: Vītarāgesu vā tesu, nikkhantesu ubhosu vā.
tika-vin10t1:4839: Catutthe pañcame ceva, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:4840: Vattabbaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vuttaṃ aniyatadvaye.
tika-vin10t1:4846: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, vutto aññatarena yo;
tika-vin10t1:4849: Cārittaṃ tassa pācitti, aññatra samayā siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4858: Ṭhitaṭṭhāne sace bhikkhuṃ, oloketvā na passati;
tika-vin10t1:4861: Sace dūre ṭhito hoti, asanto nāma bhikkhu so;
tika-vin10t1:4862: Natthi ārocane kiccaṃ, gavesitvā ito cito.
tika-vin10t1:4864: Na doso samaye santaṃ, āpucchitvā ca gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:4865: Bhikkhuṃ gharena maggo ce, ārāmaṃ gacchatopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:4870: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4878: Na paṭikkhipitabbā sā, ‘‘rogo dāni na me’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t1:4884: Tato aññehi vā bhiyyo, ācikkhitvā yathātathaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4894: Aññatra paccayā tassa, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade.
tika-vin10t1:4899: Ārohā pana cattāro, dve dve taṃpādarakkhakā;
tika-vin10t1:4900: Evaṃ dvādasaposo ca, eko hatthīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t1:4903: Eko sārathi yodheko, āṇirakkhā duve janā.
tika-vin10t1:4906: Cattāro padahatthā ca, purisā pattīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t1:4914: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, sampattaṃ pana passati;
tika-vin10t1:4921: Ākāse iddhiyā seyyaṃ, pakappetu ca iddhimā;
tika-vin10t1:4931: Uyyodhikaṃ balaggaṃ vā, senābyūhampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:4937: Sesesupi ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-vin10t1:4942: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ, surā nāmāti vuccati;
tika-vin10t1:4943: Pupphādīhi kato sabbo, āsavo hoti merayaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4946: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t1:4978: Nimujjeyyapi vā bhikkhu, ummujjeyya tareyya vā.
tika-vin10t1:4980: Payoge ca payoge ca, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:4986: Yena yena panaṅgena, bhikkhuno tarato jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:4989: Taruto tīrato vāpi, pācitti patato jale;
tika-vin10t1:4992: Pājentopi sace nāvaṃ, arittena phiyena vā;
tika-vin10t1:4993: Ussārentopi tīre vā, nāvaṃ kīḷati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:4995: Hatthena vāpi pādena, kaṭṭhena kathalāya vā;
tika-vin10t1:4998: Udakaṃ kañjikaṃ vāpi, cikkhallaṃ vāpi vikkhipaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5030: Disvā vā pana taṃ sutvā, mā vā bhāyatu, bhāyatu;
tika-vin10t1:5031: Itarassa tu bhikkhussa, hoti pācitti taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t1:5040: Jotiṃ tappetukāmo ce, jalāpeyya jaleyya vā;
tika-vin10t1:5041: Ṭhapetvā hoti pācitti, tathārūpaṃ tu paccayaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5043: Sayaṃ samādahantassa, yāva jālā na jāyati;
tika-vin10t1:5053: Anāpatti gilānassa, kataṃ aññena vā pana.
tika-vin10t1:5059: Apuṇṇe addhamāsasmiṃ, dese ce majjhime pana;
tika-vin10t1:5066: Dukkaṭaṃ atirekaddha- māse ca samayesu ca.
tika-vin10t1:5075: Cīvaraṃ yaṃ nivāsetuṃ, sakkā pārupitumpi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5079: Yena kenaci kāḷena, kaddamenapi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t1:5084: Pāḷikaṇṇikakappo vā, na ca vaṭṭati katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:5085: Ekaṃ vāpi anekaṃ vā, bindu vaṭṭati vaṭṭakaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5090: Kappe naṭṭhepi vā saddhiṃ, tena saṃsibbitesu vā;
tika-vin10t1:5101: Kappatettāvatā kāmaṃ, nidhetuṃ, na ca kappati.
tika-vin10t1:5110: Yassa kassaci nāmaṃ tu, gahetvā sahadhamminaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5115: ‘‘Tissassa bhikkhuno vā tvaṃ, tassā tissāya theriyā;
tika-vin10t1:5122: Puna tenapi vattabbaṃ, ‘‘ko te mitto’’ti bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:5127: Tissāya theriyā vā tvaṃ, santakaṃ paribhuñja vā;
tika-vin10t1:5128: Vissajjehī’’ti vā vutte, hoti paccuddhaṭaṃ puna.
tika-vin10t1:5130: Iccetāsu pana dvīsu, yāya kāyaci cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5134: Yena taṃ vinayaṃ kammaṃ, kataṃ panidha bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t1:5186: Dhovato pana pattaṃ vā, nibbāpentassa yāguyo.
tika-vin10t1:5188: Hatthena taṃ uḷuṅkena, gahetvā nhāyatopi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5189: Payoge ca payoge ca, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:5201: Siñcane siñcanaṃ vuttaṃ, paribhoge idaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t1:5203: Ayameva visesoti, tassa ceva panassa ca;
tika-vin10t1:5211: Vadatā pana taṃ kammaṃ, uccāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5213: Sace vippakate kamme, paṭikkosati taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t1:5219: ‘‘Adhammena ca vaggena, na ca kammārahassa vā;
tika-vin10t1:5220: Kata’’nti jānato natthi, doso ukkoṭane pana.
tika-vin10t1:5230: Āroceti sacaññassa, sopi aññassa vāti hi.
tika-vin10t1:5232: Evaṃ satampi bhikkhūnaṃ, sahassampi ca tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5233: Āpajjateva āpattiṃ, yāva koṭi na chijjati.
tika-vin10t1:5245: Na ca chādetukāmo vā, sabhāgaṃ vā na passati.
tika-vin10t1:5255: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, sesānaṃ hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5263: Muñcitvā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ, gaṇo ce paripūrati;
tika-vin10t1:5264: Honti te sūpasampannā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t1:5266: Upajjhāyo sace hutvā, gaṇaṃ ācariyampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5267: Pariyesati pattaṃ vā, sammannati ca māḷakaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5270: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīsu, kammavācāsu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5283: Maggaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ yo, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5285: Gamane saṃvidhāne ca, vattabbo yo vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t1:5286: So ca bhikkhunivaggasmiṃ, vuttattā na ca uddhaṭo.
tika-vin10t1:5305: Kammaṃ kileso pāko ca, upavādo atikkamo;
tika-vin10t1:5311: Tikkhattuṃ tehi vattabbo, ye passanti suṇanti ca;
tika-vin10t1:5312: ‘‘Mā hevaṃ avacāyasmā’’, iti bhikkhūhi so pana.
tika-vin10t1:5315: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīhi, kammavācāhi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5325: Saṃvaseyya ca bhuñjeyya, pācitti saha seyya vā.
tika-vin10t1:5327: Uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ, karoto saha tena hi;
tika-vin10t1:5331: Dadatopi tathā ekaṃ, bahūni ca bahūsvapi.
tika-vin10t1:5333: Ukkhittake nipannasmiṃ, itaro seti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:5334: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, paro seti ubhopi vā.
tika-vin10t1:5343: Nissaṭṭhoti ca taṃ diṭṭhiṃ, saññissosāritoti ca.
tika-vin10t1:5349: Tathā vināsitaṃ jānaṃ, upalāpeyya tena vā;
tika-vin10t1:5359: Na hettha kiñci vattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ uttānamevidaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5363: Vuccamāno hi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhu sikkhāpadena yo;
tika-vin10t1:5393: Kāretabbo tathā bhikkhu, yathā dhammo ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t1:5398: Evaṃ āropite mohe, yadi moheti yo pana;
tika-vin10t1:5399: Tasmiṃ mohanake vuttā, pācitti pana puggale.
tika-vin10t1:5411: Kuddho deti pahāraṃ ce, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5414: Dinne bhijjatu sīsaṃ vā, pādo vā paribhijjatu;
tika-vin10t1:5415: So ce maratu vā, mā vā, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t1:5418: Kaṇṇaṃ vā tassa nāsaṃ vā, yadi chindati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5426: Pahāraṃ deti mokkhādhi-ppāyo doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:5432: Iti vatvā panāyantaṃ, ‘‘gaccha re’’ti ca muggaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5433: Satthaṃ vāpi gahetvā vā, paharitvā tu yāti ce.
tika-vin10t1:5435: Anāpatti sace tena, pahārena matepi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5442: Kāyaṃ vā kāyabaddhaṃ vā, uccāreyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:5445: Uggiritvā viraddho so, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t1:5448: Sace tena pahārena, pahaṭassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:5449: Hatthādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, aṅgaṃ bhijjati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5468: Hoti vācāya vācāya, pācitti pana bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t1:5475: Vikāle ca tayā bhuttaṃ, mā eva’’nti ca bhāsato.
tika-vin10t1:5481: Sace bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhu yo;
tika-vin10t1:5484: ‘‘Yaṃ ime tu bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī’’ti gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:5503: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t1:5504: Pacchā khīyati pācitti, vācato vācato siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5510: Ime kammaṃ karontī’’ti, ñatvā khīyati tassa ca.
tika-vin10t1:5517: Ṭhapitā ñatti vā niṭṭhaṃ, kammavācā na gacchati.
tika-vin10t1:5519: Etasmiṃ antare kammaṃ, kopetuṃ parisāya hi;
tika-vin10t1:5522: Adatvā jahite chandaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5523: Dhammakamme adhamme ca, vimatissa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5528: Gilāno vā gilānassa, karaṇīye na dosatā;
tika-vin10t1:5535: Samaggena ca saṅghena, saddhiṃ datvāna cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5536: Sammatassa hi bhikkhussa, pacchā khīyati yo pana.
tika-vin10t1:5539: Tikapācittiyaṃ dhamma- kamme vuttaṃ tu cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5562: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t1:5563: Deviyā vāpi rañño vā, sace na viditāgamo.
tika-vin10t1:5584: Sace kappiyavatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vāpi akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5591: ‘‘Na vaṭṭatī’’ti vatvā taṃ, na nidhetabbameva tu.
tika-vin10t1:5594: Palibodho hi nāmeso, ṭhapetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5613: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5615: Atha sambahulā gāmaṃ, vikāle pavisanti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5618: Gacchanti ce tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5619: Puna āpucchane kiccaṃ, natthi gāmasatepi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5622: Pavisanti sace aññaṃ, pucchitabbaṃ tu antarā.
tika-vin10t1:5624: Katvā kulaghare bhatta- kiccaṃ aññattha vā pana;
tika-vin10t1:5625: Sace caritukāmo yo, sappibhikkhāya vā siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5627: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu labbhati;
tika-vin10t1:5628: Asante pana natthīti, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5630: Otaritvā mahāvīthiṃ, bhikkhuṃ yadi ca passati;
tika-vin10t1:5636: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu vijjati;
tika-vin10t1:5656: Kārāpane ca karaṇe, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5661: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato;
tika-vin10t1:5668: Navaṃ mañcampi pīṭhaṃ vā, kārāpentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5675: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:5681: Uttānaṃ vāpi aṭṭaṃ vā, bandhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t1:5684: Mañcaṃ vā pana pīṭhaṃ vā, tūlonaddhaṃ kareyya yo;
tika-vin10t1:5690: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, uddāletvā nisevato;
tika-vin10t1:5698: Dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā, tassa tisso dasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5716: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu kāreyya, karaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5721: Dīghaso ca pamāṇena, nava tassa vidatthiyo;
tika-vin10t1:5724: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevato dukkaṭaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t1:5731: Yo cantaragharaṃ bhikkhu, paviṭṭhāya tu hatthato;
tika-vin10t1:5732: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, tassa bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t1:5740: Rathikāya sace ṭhatvā, deti bhikkhuni bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5741: Āpatti antarārāme, ṭhatvā gaṇhāti bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t1:5747: Vīthiyādīsu ce ṭhatvā, na doso paṭigaṇhato.
tika-vin10t1:5764: Gāmato nīharitvā vā, deti ce bahi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5780: Anāpattittano bhattaṃ, padāpeti na deti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5781: Tathā aññassa bhattaṃ vā, na dāpeti padeti ce.
tika-vin10t1:5783: Yaṃ na dinnaṃ taṃ dāpeti, na dinnaṃ yattha vāpi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5784: Tattha tampi ca sabbesaṃ, samaṃ dāpeti bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t1:5800: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5806: Nimantitassa vā bhikkhā, aññesaṃ tattha dīyati.
tika-vin10t1:5808: Gharato nīharitvā vā, denti ce yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t1:5811: Anāgate hi bhikkhumhi, gharato paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:5812: Nīharitvā sace dvāre, sampatte denti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5814: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca disvāva, nīharitvāna gehato;
tika-vin10t1:5819: Ārāmaṃ upacāraṃ vā, pavisitvā sace pana.
tika-vin10t1:5825: Tassa vā parivārampi, aññaṃ katvā bahuṃ pana.
tika-vin10t1:5827: Yāguyā viditaṃ katvā, pūvaṃ bhattaṃ haranti ce;
tika-vin10t1:5831: Haranti tena saddhiṃ ce, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati tampi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5836: Yaṃ asaṃviditaṃ katvā, ābhataṃ pana taṃ bahi;
tika-vin10t1:5839: Gantvā vā antarāmagge, gahetabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5864: Otāretvā nivatthabbaṃ, tato ūnaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5870: Ubho koṇe samaṃ katvā, sādaraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5874: Tasmā ghare vihāre vā, kattabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5877: Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā, katvā koṇe ubho samaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5880: Tathā akatvā bhikkhussa, jattūnipi urampi ca;
tika-vin10t1:5885: Hatthe piṇḍikamaṃsamhā, heṭṭhā pāde ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t1:5888: Hoti so suppaṭicchanno, doso vāsūpagassa na.
tika-vin10t1:5891: Hatthaṃ vā pana pādaṃ vā, acālentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t1:5898: Yattha katthaci hi ṭṭhāne, ekasmiṃ antare ghare;
tika-vin10t1:5901: Yo anādariyaṃ katvā, olokento tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5923: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, tatheva ca nisīdato.
tika-vin10t1:5925: Kāyaṃ bāhuñca sīsañca, paggahetvā ujuṃ pana;
tika-vin10t1:5932: Khambhaṃ katvā sasīsaṃ vā, pārupitvāna gacchato;
tika-vin10t1:5933: Dukkaṭaṃ muninā vuttaṃ, tathā ukkuṭikāya vā.
tika-vin10t1:5938: Dutiye ca catutthe ca, chaṭṭhe vāsūpagassa tu;
tika-vin10t1:5956: Yaṃ kiñci pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:5959: Sese thūpīkataṃ sabbaṃ, vaṭṭateva na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t1:5961: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ tu, gahetvā pattamekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:5962: Pūretvā yadi peseti, bhikkhūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:5965: Orohati sace heṭṭhā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5968: Dinnaṃ ayāvakālittā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5971: Piṇḍapātaṃ sace denti, idaṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t1:5973: Bhattassūpari paṇṇaṃ vā, thālakaṃ vāpi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:5976: Paṭiggahetumevassa, taṃ tu sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:5980: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ vutta-nayaṃ tu tatiye pana;
tika-vin10t1:5983: Aññesaṃ attano bhattaṃ, ākiraṃ pana bhājane;
tika-vin10t1:5987: Catutthe yaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, vuttaṃ pubbe asesato;
tika-vin10t1:5994: Yo bhiyyokamyatāhetu, sūpaṃ vā byañjanampi vā;
tika-vin10t1:5998: Viññattiyaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:5999: Aṭṭhame pana ujjhāne, gilānopi na muccati.
tika-vin10t1:6021: Mukhe ca sakalaṃ hatthaṃ, pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:6022: Mukhe ca kabaḷaṃ katvā, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6024: Vacanaṃ yattakenassa, paripuṇṇaṃ na hoti hi;
tika-vin10t1:6028: Vacanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ce, kathetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6032: Makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe vā, katvā bhuñjeyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:6043: Katvā evaṃ na bhottabbaṃ, saddaṃ ‘‘suru surū’’ti ca;
tika-vin10t1:6044: Hatthanillehakaṃ vāpi, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t1:6046: Phāṇitaṃ ghanayāguṃ vā, gahetvā aṅgulīhi taṃ;
tika-vin10t1:6053: Sāmisena tu hatthena, na ca pānīyathālakaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:6057: Santako pana saṅkho vā, sarāvaṃ vāpi thālakaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:6059: Tasmā na ca gahetabbaṃ, gaṇhato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:6067: Chattaṃ yaṃ kiñci hatthena, sarīrāvayavena vā;
tika-vin10t1:6076: Satthapāṇī na hotāsiṃ, sannayhitvā ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t1:6079: Dhanuṃ sarena saddhiṃ vā, dhanuṃ vā sarameva vā;
tika-vin10t1:6083: Sace deseti saddhammaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:6086: Na gaṇhāti naro tāva, dhammaṃ deseyya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t1:6094: Sabbattha agilānassa, yāne vā sayanepi vā.
tika-vin10t1:6097: Pīṭhe mañcepi vā ucce, nisinnena ṭhitena vā.
tika-vin10t1:6099: Na ca vaṭṭati desetuṃ, ṭhatvā vā uccabhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t1:6102: Samāne vāpi ucce vā, nipanne neva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6116: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, dasame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t1:6119: Pañhaṃ pucchati ce thero, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6124: Gacchato purato pañhaṃ, na vattabbaṃ tu pacchato;
tika-vin10t1:6127: Saddhiṃ uggahitaṃ dhammaṃ, sajjhāyati hi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6135: Tatiye natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthe harite pana;
tika-vin10t1:6138: Jīvarukkhassa yaṃ mūlaṃ, dissamānaṃ tu gacchati;
tika-vin10t1:6139: Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā taṃ, sabbaṃ haritameva hi.
tika-vin10t1:6147: Kato aharite ṭhāne, haritaṃ eti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t1:6148: Siṅghāṇikā gatā ettha, kheḷeneva ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t1:6154: Deve pana ca vassante, udakoghe samantato;
